## Description
 Iron(II) hydroxide is a white solid, but even traces&#10;&#9;of oxygen impart a greenish tinge. The air-oxidized solid is sometimes known as &quot;green rust&quot;.&#10;&#9;Extracted from akaganeite.

## Characteristics

| Attribute      | Value |
|--------:|:------|
|Edible:|false|
|Type:|Compound|
|Form:|Solid|
